description: Ms. codex. Title from beginning of text (fol. 2b, l. 12). Incipit: الحمد لله جاعل العلماء انجما للاهتداء زاهرة واعلاما للاقتداء طاهرة ... اما بعد فهذا كتاب يصغر للحافظ حجمه Explicit: منعنا الشركة او للمسجد من غير ذكر انفقاق يبطلها واجازها تمت والله اعلم Physical description: 13 lines per page. Written in thick medium small naskh in black ink with use of red for re-inking and key-words ; red circle text-stops. Thick cream paper with pulp visible. Marginal annotations, apparently by the same hand as the main text (scarce after fol. 57b). Several inscriptions, including ownership statements on fol. 1a-2a. Waqf (see inscription on the upper margin of fol. 2b). Inscription in Arabic numerals in red pencil on a label pasted on the upper cover: "161". Inscription in Arabic script on a label pasted on the pastedown of the upper cover: "Ḥāʼ 597/2". Origin: Copy completed on 884 H. (colophon, fol. 137b).
author: Ibn al-Sāʻātī, Aḥmad ibn ʻAlī, 1254-1294 or 1295
abstract: Compendium on Ḥanafī law, based on the Mukhtaṣar by al-Qudūrī (d. 428/1037) and the Manẓūmah by al-Nasafī (d. 537/1142), completed in 690/1291 (see GAL).
extent: i, 139, i leaves: paper ; 180 x 130 (122 x 90) mm. bound to 180 x 135 mm.
provenance: Ownership statement in the name of Muḥammad ibn ʻAbd al-Ḥalīm al-BR-- (fol. 2a) ; of Shaykh Muṣṭafá FQRī al-Qādirī al-Ṣamādī ibn Ḥasan ibn ʻAlī (fol. 2a). Seal on fol. 139a. Acquired from Abraham Shalom Yahuda, 1942.
